Cream
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 28 - Spread thinly on the affected skin only

Excipients

May contain

Benzyl alcohol, cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), hydroxybenzoates (parabens), propylene glycol
